text: Ezɨ e aruemɨn adarazi, kamaghɨn e deraghvɨra nɨghnɨgham. E nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir arazim ko igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim nigham. Egh bizir kamning inighɨva mɨdorozir korotiamɨn mɨn uan evariba ikeghtɨ da e apazagham. Egh Godɨn mɨzuam ikɨ an akurvazir arazim inigh, e mɨdorozir dapanir asuamɨn mɨn anerughtɨ an e apazagham.
